CommandBars
Xtreme CommandBars
Xtreme CommandBars provides Windows developers with comprehensive, fully customizable menus and toolbars.

Learn More About Xtreme CommandBars
CalendarPro
Xtreme CalendarPro
Xtreme CalendarPro provides Windows developers with a sophisticated Outlook 2003 style calendar and date selection components.

Controls
Xtreme Controls
Xtreme Controls provides Windows GUI software engineers with several ready-to-use components that have been thoroughly designed and tested.

Learn More About Xtreme Controls

Tab Control
Xtreme SuitePro provides you with a fully customize Tab Control.

    * MDI Style Tabbed Interface
    * Tab Reordering
    * Static Frame
    * Luna Colors
    * OneNote Colors
    * Custom OneNote Colors
    * Show Icons
    * Custom Icons
    * Hot Tracking
    * Bold Selected
    * Tab Position
    * Tab Layout
    * Rotated Tab Layout
    * Multi-Row Tab Layout
    * Tab Appearance
    * Tab Color
    * Tab Workspace Border/Frame
    * Margins

Popup Window
Xtreme SuitePro provides you with fully customizable popup windows.

    * Theme Support
    * Animation
    * Transparency
    * Hyperlink
    * Delay
    * Animation Delay
    * Item Background and Border
    * Item Icons and Buttons
